values.value:
Purchased leave must be consumed in the same financial year it is bought. Unclaimed purchased leave will be reimbursed on your first payslip of June.

“Employees can apply to purchase a maximum of 2 weeks of Additional Leave in a financial year, using a salary sacrifice deduction scheme.”

Employees will have their salary/wages proportionally deducted using a salary sacrifice scheme calculated on the current salary/wages based on the number of weeks they purchase.
